original_title: The King, the Lawyers, and the Cheese
overview: Brigid Maher's documentary chronicles the legal struggle of underground cartoonist King Velveeda (born Stu Helm). In March 2002, Kraft filed a lawsuit against King Velveeda, claiming that his outrageous cartoons were somehow a bad reflection on Velveeta cheese products.
title: The King, the Lawyers, and the Cheese
